product_name: Pepper's Krysten Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Pepper's Krysten Polarized Sunglasses not only look great on, but they also provide 100% UV protection to shield your eyes on bright, sunny days. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Polycarbonate frames are strong and durable. Closeout.
